name: Oil Mogul
description:
Oil Mogul.
Experience the oil intoxication and become a successful oil entrepreneur in the 19th century
in North America. Manage price fluctuations and sell oil or kerosene.
While you earn money by digging up and selling oil, the city will
grow with you.

Buy land and search for oil. Build refineries, build a pipe network and promote
the oil to store it in silos. Sell ​​the oil at the best prices. Invest money in your train
station to expand it. Buy essential upgrades in the city to increase your funding.
Be better than the competition.
pass the time in the Saloon with gambling!

  • Start your career and become an oil mogul.


  • Any amount of upgrades to improve your oil production.


  • Games in the saloon.


  • Steam Cloud Save.


  • Buy land and search for oil.


  • Maximize your profits by making petroleum.


  • Beat your competition by selling more than anyone else.


  • Build silos to save oil and wait for the oil rush!


  • Drill neighboring properties to steal oil!
